issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
I try to test the app on the android emulator (with genymotion), but the app gets never installed. The emulator launches, but the app is not installed.

It works on iOS, but not on Android.


h3. Actual Result
TRACE  | titanium exited with exit code 1
ERROR  | Error: ti run exited with error code 1
    at ChildProcess.<anonymous> (/Users/masuno/.appcelerator/install/4.0.0/package/node_modules/appc-cli-titanium/plugins/run.js:84:66)
    at ChildProcess.emit (events.js:98:17)
    at Process.ChildProcess._handle.onexit (child_process.js:810:12)

h3. Expected Result
test the app
fields.summary: Can not test app on android emulator
